EmailTemplate.name: Patient Notification for visit summaries
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Organization.Name} has shared Visit Summary on Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.Name},
{!Organization.Name} has shared the visit summary related to your recent visit.
Please login into your portal {Patientportallink} to review the visit summary.
Please get in touch with us for any queries.
Regards, {!Organization.Name}
